title: Bitcoin Price Surge: BTC Rockets Past $111,000 Mark!
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Price Surge: BTC Rockets Past $111,000 Mark! The cryptocurrency world is buzzing with excitement as Bitcoin (BTC) has achieved a remarkable milestone, soaring past the $111,000 mark . This incredible Bitcoin price surge has captivated investors and analysts alike, marking a significant moment in the digital asset landscape. According to real-time market monitoring, BTC is currently trading at an impressive $111,086.58 on the Binance USDT market, showcasing robust momentum. What‚Äôs Fueling This Bitcoin Price Surge? Understanding the forces behind such a significant move is crucial. Several factors often contribute to a sudden rally in Bitcoin‚Äôs value. This recent ascent above $111,000 isn‚Äôt happening in a vacuum; it‚Äôs likely a confluence of various market dynamics and investor sentiment. Increased Institutional Interest: More large corporations and financial institutions are exploring or actively investing in Bitcoin. This growing adoption signals confidence and brings substantial capital into the market. Macroeconomic Factors: Global economic uncertainties can often push investors towards safe-haven assets or inflation hedges, and many now view Bitcoin in this light. Supply Dynamics: Bitcoin‚Äôs fixed supply and periodic halving events inherently create scarcity. As demand rises against a limited supply, price appreciation is a natural outcome. Positive Market Sentiment: A general wave of optimism, often fueled by positive news or influential figures, can create a ‚Äòfear of missing out‚Äô (FOMO) effect, driving further buying pressure. The sustained interest in Bitcoin as a store of value continues to strengthen its position in the global financial ecosystem. This latest Bitcoin price surge is a testament to its enduring appeal and growing acceptance. Navigating the Excitement: What Does the Bitcoin Price Surge Mean for You? For both seasoned traders and newcomers, a price movement of this magnitude prompts important questions. Is this the start of a new bull run, or a temporary spike? While no one can predict the future with absolute certainty, understanding the potential implications can help you make informed decisions. Benefits for Holders: Increased Portfolio Value: Existing Bitcoin holders see a direct increase in the value of their digital assets. Renewed Market Confidence: A strong rally can boost overall confidence in the crypto market, potentially drawing in new investors. Challenges and Considerations: Volatility: While the Bitcoin price surge is exciting, crypto markets are known for their volatility. Prices can fluctuate rapidly. Market Corrections: After significant upward moves, minor or major corrections are common as investors take profits. It‚Äôs always wise to conduct your own research and consider your risk tolerance before making any investment decisions. The journey of Bitcoin has always been dynamic, and its path above $111,000 adds another thrilling chapter to its history. Looking Ahead: Sustaining the Bitcoin Price Surge Momentum The current momentum is undeniable, but what will it take for Bitcoin to maintain its elevated position or even climb higher? Continued innovation in the blockchain space, clearer regulatory frameworks, and broader mainstream adoption will be key. The ongoing development of layer-2 solutions and decentralized finance (DeFi) platforms also contributes to Bitcoin‚Äôs utility and long-term value proposition. This impressive rise above $111,000 underscores Bitcoin‚Äôs resilience and its growing acceptance as a legitimate asset class. The global interest in this digital currency only seems to intensify with each new milestone. The future trajectory of Bitcoin will be fascinating to watch, especially as more individuals and institutions recognize its transformative potential. In conclusion, the recent ascent of BTC above the $111,000 threshold is a significant event that highlights the ongoing evolution and maturation of the cryptocurrency market. This Bitcoin price surge reflects a combination of growing demand, institutional confidence, and macro-economic tailwinds. As Bitcoin continues to forge new paths, it remains a compelling asset for those looking to understand and participate in the future of finance. Frequently Asked Questions About the Bitcoin Price Surge Here are some common questions regarding Bitcoin‚Äôs recent performance: Q: What does it mean for BTC to ‚Äúrise above $111,000‚Äù? A: It signifies that the market price of one Bitcoin has surpassed the $111,000 valuation, indicating strong buying pressure and investor confidence. Q: Is this a good time to buy Bitcoin? A: Investment decisions depend on individual financial goals and risk tolerance. While a rising price can indicate positive momentum, it‚Äôs crucial to research thoroughly and consider market volatility. Consulting a financial advisor is always recommended. Q: What factors typically influence Bitcoin‚Äôs price? A: Bitcoin‚Äôs price is influenced by supply and demand, institutional adoption, macroeconomic conditions, regulatory news, technological developments, and overall market sentiment. Q: How does this Bitcoin price surge compare to previous rallies? A: Bitcoin has a history of significant price rallies and corrections. Each surge is unique, driven by its own set of market conditions. This current move adds to its legacy of impressive growth. Q: Where can I monitor Bitcoin‚Äôs price in real-time? A: Reputable cryptocurrency exchanges like Binance, Coinbase, and dedicated crypto market monitoring platforms provide real-time price data for Bitcoin and other digital assets. Did you find this analysis of the Bitcoin price surge insightful? Share this article with your friends, family, and fellow crypto enthusiasts on social media to spread awareness about this exciting market development! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action. title: Top 7 High-Potential Tokens to Watch in November 2025
body: As the crypto market recalibrates after months of uneven momentum, investors are shifting focus toward projects with strong fundamentals, working products, and clear utility. November 2025 marks a return to quality ‚Äî and several standout tokens are leading this shift. Below are seven high-potential cryptocurrencies that deserve close attention this month, spanning Web3 gaming, interoperability, infrastructure, and legacy networks preparing for renewed cycles. 1. TRUE (TRUE) ‚Äî Web3 Gaming Built on Real Revenue TRUE World by TRUE LABS continues to redefine what ‚Äúutility‚Äù means in GameFi. It‚Äôs the first token launch in the sector backed by a functioning gaming business with verified revenue, millions of players, and a mature partner ecosystem. Unlike most gaming tokens that rely on hype or speculative staking, $TRUE connects gameplay directly with economic value through a closed-loop model: Player engagement fuels in-game fees, NFTs, and upgrades. A share of revenue funds buybacks and deflationary burns. The token powers staking, governance, and exclusive in-game progression. With listings on top exchanges expected before the year‚Äôs end, the TRUE token launch could be the blueprint for sustainable Web3 economies ‚Äî where token value is rooted in real user activity and consistent cash flow. Watch for official announcements of $TRUE listing details at x.com/TRUExWorld 2. Polkadot (DOT) ‚Äî Rebuilding Momentum Through Decentralized Parachains Once a top-three project by market cap, Polkadot (DOT) has spent much of 2025 consolidating after years of heavy development. Its focus on modular parachains and decentralized governance is finally beginning to mature. The new OpenGov framework has streamlined treasury proposals and expanded staking rewards, while ecosystem projects in DeFi and identity are regaining traction.If network activity continues to rise, DOT could enter a new accumulation phase, paving the way toward a medium-term recovery above US$ 9,50. 3. Litecoin (LTC) ‚Äî Legacy Chain with Renewed Utility Often dismissed as a legacy coin, Litecoin (LTC) is quietly benefiting from broader adoption. It remains one of the most used payment cryptocurrencies thanks to fast, low-cost transactions and Lightning Network compatibility. Recent integration with Layer-2 bridges has revived on-chain activity, and increased merchant acceptance is sustaining daily volume. LTC‚Äôs modest valuation relative to Bitcoin leaves room for upside ‚Äî especially if risk sentiment improves and payment-focused assets come back into favor. 4. Pudgy Penguins (PENGU) ‚Äî The NFT Brand That Refused to Fade Pudgy Penguins (PENGU) has evolved from an NFT collection into a fully-fledged entertainment and brand ecosystem. Its token bridges Web2 merchandise success with Web3 ownership through collectibles, licensing, and gaming. The project‚Äôs strong retail presence and partnership expansion continue to give it an edge in cultural adoption. As NFT-native brands converge with metaverse and social gaming, Pudgy‚Äôs loyal community keeps it relevant ‚Äî and potentially one of the few tokens to balance fun with functionality. 5. Aptos (APT) ‚Äî High-Performance Layer-1 With Institutional Interest Aptos (APT) remains a standout among next-gen Layer-1 blockchains. Despite volatility, the network boasts steady growth in DeFi protocols and developer tools. Institutional attention around parallel execution and fast finality keeps APT on watchlists for Q4. If liquidity flows back into Tier-1 ecosystems, APT could revisit US$ 4,80 or higher, reaffirming its position as one of the most technically advanced Layer-1s. 6. Aster (ASTER) ‚Äî Cross-Chain Connectivity Rebound Candidate Aster (ASTER) continues to pursue its mission of linking disparate ecosystems through efficient cross-chain communication. After enduring a correction in October, the token‚Äôs fundamentals ‚Äî developer adoption and bridge performance ‚Äî remain solid. In a more risk-on market, interoperability narratives tend to resurface quickly. If Bitcoin stabilizes, ASTER could stage a move toward US$ 1,70, supported by rising usage of its multi-chain DeFi integrations. 7. Internet Computer (ICP) ‚Äî Innovation Waiting for Rediscovery Internet Computer (ICP) stays one of crypto‚Äôs most ambitious projects, aiming to decentralize the internet itself. With smart contracts that run at web speed and scalable storage, its technology continues to impress developers even as market sentiment fluctuates. ICP‚Äôs current challenge is visibility rather than capability. Should optimism return and investors rotate toward infrastructure plays, ICP could regain ground toward the US$ 4,40‚Äì4,50 range. Its potential remains vast ‚Äî it simply needs the market‚Äôs attention back. Final Take November 2025 reveals a telling pattern: investors are rewarding projects with tangible ecosystems and moving away from hollow narratives. TRUE leads this trend as the clearest example of Web3 backed by real-world revenue, signaling a new phase where blockchain utility converges with established business models. Legacy players like Polkadot and Litecoin show that longevity still counts when fundamentals are solid. Meanwhile, Aptos, Aster, and ICP continue to drive technical innovation ‚Äî and Pudgy Penguins keeps cultural momentum alive in a cooling NFT market. If the next bull cycle is built on sustainability rather than speculation, these seven projects could define it. title: Binance.US responds to Senator Murphy over TRUMP coin allegations
body: Binance.US has bashed claims from US Senator Chris Murphy, accusing the exchange of favoring President Donald Trump-related assets, following its decision to list stablecoin USD1. On Wednesday, Binance.US defended its listing of USD1, the stablecoin issued by Trump-affiliated World Liberty Financial, after Senator Murphy wrote a message on X yesterday claiming the exchange was promoting the asset because of Trump‚Äôs business relationship with Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao. As reported by Cryptopolitan last week, Trump granted a presidential pardon to Zhao, who had been previously convicted of violating U.S. anti-money laundering laws. Murphy, a Democrat from Connecticut, wrote on X that the USD1 listing is ‚Äúpayback‚Äù for the pardon. ‚ÄúOne week after Trump pardoned Binance‚Äôs owner for a stunning array of crimes related to terrorist and sex predator financing, Binance started promoting Trump crypto. The White House is a full-time, 24/7 corruption machine,‚Äù he wrote. In a statement replying to the Liberal Senator, Binance.US said its listing decisions are subject to a rigorous review process. ‚ÄúWe conduct comprehensive due diligence and legal review before listing any asset on Binance US, whether it‚Äôs a stablecoin, a new ecosystem project, or a meme token,‚Äù the firm reiterated . Binance US: Business decision unfairly politicized The exchange‚Äôs US arm noted that both USD1 and WLFI are already listed on more than 20 major exchanges, including Coinbase, Robinhood, and Kraken. ‚ÄúThese assets have both been approved for some time by our listing committee in its ordinary course of business,‚Äù the statement continued. ‚ÄúTo be clear, this was a business decision on the part of Binance US and nothing more. It‚Äôs unfortunate that even routine business decisions are now unfairly politicized by our elected officials.‚Äù On paper, the listing on Binance.US is meant to be an expansion of stablecoin options for US traders. However, it became politically charged after Zhao‚Äôs pardon, which opponents of the Trump administration insist is an example of undue influence by powerful crypto interests. Zhao, who co-founded Binance in 2017, pleaded guilty in 2023 to failing to implement an effective anti-money laundering program. The plea was part of a settlement in which Binance admitted to criminal charges and agreed to pay more than $4.3 billion in penalties to the US government. The Binance co-founder personally paid a $50 million fine and served four months in federal prison before being released last year. On Monday, Representative Rohit Khanna of California‚Äôs 17th congressional district accused Trump of engaging in open corruption in an interview with CNBC. ‚ÄúYou‚Äôve got a foreign billionaire who was basically engaged in money laundering, having money go to Hamas, having money go to Iran, having money go to child abusers. He was convicted. He served four years in prison. And then he petitions for a pardon from Donald Trump after basically funneling money to terrorists,‚Äù the 49-year-old California Rep asserted. The pardon of Zhao is corrupt. I explain simply what's going on. I am today introducing legislation to ban the president, his family, members of Congress, and all elected officials from trading crypto or stocks. @unusual_whales has been sounding the alarm on this for years. pic.twitter.com/OgibgdnqkK ‚Äî Ro Khanna (@RoKhanna) October 27, 2025 Khanna propounded that Zhao offered financial support to World Liberty and, in return, received a pardon. ‚ÄúDonald Trump gives him a pardon while he‚Äôs basically financing Donald Trump‚Äôs cryptocurrency stablecoin. It is so illegal. It is right in our faces,‚Äù he said. Do Trump‚Äôs businesses present a conflict of interest? At the start of his first term, Trump refused to divest his assets or place them in a blind trust, a departure from modern presidential norms established by figures like Jimmy Carter, who sold his peanut farm to avoid conflicts. The US President placed his holdings in a trust controlled by his family, with himself as the sole beneficiary. During his first tenure at the Oval Office, he faced repeated accusations of profiting from foreign and domestic interests, including visits from officials representing 20 foreign governments to Trump-owned properties. The Secret Service reportedly spent more than $10 million on lodging at his hotels. After winning back the top seat in the US, Trump agreed to hand everything over to a trust managed by his sons, although naysayers believe he is making decisions that are directly benefitting the companies. ‚ÄúSuch unprecedented disregard for time-honored ethical boundaries was shocking at the time. Now it looks merely quaint,‚Äù said Danielle Caputo, senior legal counsel for ethics at the Campaign Legal Center, a nonprofit watchdog group. ‚ÄúWith this new administration, there‚Äôs not just a disregard for ethics rules, there‚Äôs contempt.‚Äù Get seen where it counts. Advertise in Cryptopolitan Research and reach crypto‚Äôs sharpest investors and builders.

title: Bitcoin ETF Inflows Flip Positive, But Demand Still Muted: Glassnode
body: On-chain analytics firm Glassnode has pointed out how Bitcoin spot ETF inflows are still not at the intensity seen during previous rallies this cycle. Bitcoin Spot ETF Inflows Are Currently Under 1,000 BTC Per Day In a new post on X, Glassnode has talked about the latest trend in the inflows of the spot exchange-traded funds (ETFs) . The spot ETFs refer to investment vehicles that allow investors to gain exposure to an asset‚Äôs price movements without having to directly own it. The US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) approved spot ETFs for Bitcoin back in January 2024. Whenever a trader invests into one of these products, the fund buys and holds BTC on their behalf. This means that an investor of a spot ETF never has to deal with anything involving the blockchain, like an exchange or wallet. This convenience of these investment vehicles has made them a popular mode of exposure for cryptocurrencies among the traditional investors. Institutional entities , in particular, prefer to invest through these regulated products. The netflow related to the spot ETFs can, therefore, be worth keeping an eye on, as the trend in it may contain information about how institutions are feeling about Bitcoin. Below is the chart shared by Glassnode that shows how the BTC US spot ETF netflow has changed over the past year. As is visible in the graph, the Bitcoin spot ETF netflow fell into the negative territory earlier in the month, indicating that capital was flowing out of these funds. This phase of outflows coincided with the cryptocurrency‚Äôs decline toward $104,000. The price recovery that has followed since then, however, has brought with it a renewal of inflows into the spot ETFs. Thus, it would appear that demand for the asset has made a comeback. That said, the netflow is currently still sitting at a positive level below 1,000 BTC per day. For comparison, other major rallies in this cycle started with inflows above 2,500 BTC per day. ‚ÄúDemand is recovering, but not at the intensity of recent rallies,‚Äù concluded Glassnode. The spot ETF netflow isn‚Äôt the only indicator that‚Äôs hinting at weak demand among institutions. As CryptoQuant community analyst Maartunn has pointed out in an X post , the Coinbase Premium Gap is also relatively neutral at the moment. The Coinbase Premium Gap tracks the difference between the Bitcoin price listed on Coinbase (USD pair) and that on Binance (USDT pair). Coinbase is the preferred cryptocurrency exchange of the US institutional entities, including being the custodian for the spot ETFs themselves. A positive value on the metric can imply Coinbase users are currently applying a higher amount of buying pressure compared to Binance traders. Recent rallies involved such a trend, but the metric is sitting at just neutral values right now. BTC Price At the time of writing, Bitcoin is trading around $112,400, up 3.5% over the last week.

title: Best Licensed Platforms for Buying Crypto via SEPA Transfers
body: Buying crypto with euros doesn‚Äôt have to mean card fees or hidden mark-ups. In 2025, several licensed crypto exchanges now support SEPA and SEPA Instant transfers, letting European users fund their accounts and purchase Bitcoin, Ethereum, or stablecoins quickly ‚Äî and at transparent rates. Below, we review the best regulated platforms for buying crypto through SEPA transfers, what makes them reliable, and how to use them safely. Why Choose a Licensed Crypto Exchange Platform Using a regulated exchange or payment service ensures that your card transactions are processed securely and that both your funds and data are protected. Here‚Äôs what sets licensed platforms apart: Regulatory oversight ‚Äî ensures transparency and AML/KYC compliance. Better security ‚Äî card transactions are encrypted and monitored. Fewer hidden fees ‚Äî clear exchange rates and fee breakdowns. Consumer protection ‚Äî compliance with EU financial and payment rules. If you plan to buy crypto frequently, choosing a regulated service can help you avoid unnecessary costs and risk. How SEPA Crypto Purchases Work Choose a licensed exchange or platform that supports SEPA deposits. Verify your identity (KYC) ‚Äî required by all regulated providers. Link your euro bank account and get an assigned deposit reference. Send EUR via SEPA from your bank app. Buy crypto ‚Äî once funds arrive (often instantly), purchase any supported token. Most platforms credit funds within minutes if both banks support SEPA Instant, or within one business day for standard SEPA transfers. Top Licensed Platforms for Buying Crypto via SEPA 1. Clapp ‚Äî All-in-One Licensed Platform for Instant Crypto Purchases Clapp.finance is one of the most seamless and compliant options to buy crypto directly in euros using SEPA or SEPA Instant. Licensed as a Virtual Asset Service Provider (VASP) in the Czech Republic, Clapp offers instant card purchases for major assets such as BTC, ETH, USDT, and popular DeFi tokens. What sets Clapp apart is its integrated ecosystem: users can buy crypto, manage portfolios, rebalance automatically, and even convert assets back to euros through SEPA withdrawals ‚Äî all within one secure app. Security is handled by Fireblocks, the institutional-grade custody provider trusted by major banks and exchanges. Why choose Clapp: EU-licensed and compliant Fireblocks-secured wallet Real-time rates sourced from multiple liquidity providers Fiat on/off-ramp integration (SEPA & SEPA Instant) Best for: Users who value regulatory assurance and simplicity in one unified app. 2. Coinbase ‚Äî The Simplest Card Gateway Coinbase remains one of the most beginner-friendly exchanges for card purchases. It supports Visa and Mastercard payments across most European countries and delivers instant crypto settlement. Fees are higher (around 3.99% per transaction), but Coinbase‚Äôs trusted brand, strong security, and simple interface make it an excellent option for newcomers to crypto. Best for: First-time buyers who want a familiar, regulated entry point. 3. Binance ‚Äî Fast Purchases with Global Reach Binance supports credit and debit card payments in EUR, alongside Apple Pay and Google Pay options. The exchange‚Äôs vast liquidity pool ensures tight spreads and quick execution, while its compliance framework continues to expand across Europe. Fees typically range from 1.8% to 2.5%, depending on the card issuer and region. Binance also provides an instant ‚ÄúBuy Crypto‚Äù feature that supports hundreds of tokens in one transaction. Best for: Active users who prioritize speed and variety. 4. Bitstamp ‚Äî Trusted and Transparent Since 2011 Bitstamp is one of Europe‚Äôs longest-operating licensed exchanges, regulated by the Luxembourg Financial Industry Supervisory Commission (CSSF). It supports Visa and Mastercard purchases in euros, with transparent fees and reliable service. The platform‚Äôs long regulatory record and focus on security make it a trusted choice for European investors seeking stability and clarity. Best for: Long-term investors who prefer established, regulation-first exchanges. 5. Kraken ‚Äî Regulated Exchange with Card Support Kraken recently expanded its payment options to include debit card purchases for select regions in Europe. Known for its tight spreads and robust security infrastructure, Kraken offers one of the cleanest fiat-to-crypto experiences, with low trading fees and full transparency. Card transactions on Kraken are processed through secure partners, ensuring compliance with European financial standards. Best for: Investors who prioritize security and professional-grade infrastructure. 6. OKX ‚Äî Competitive Fees and Multi-Asset Access OKX enables users to buy crypto using Visa, Mastercard, or bank transfer, with support for over 90 fiat currencies, including EUR. The exchange partners with regulated payment processors, ensuring smooth and compliant card transactions. With low spreads and broad asset coverage, OKX is ideal for users who want affordability and variety in one interface. Best for: Cost-conscious users who value low fees and a wide token range. 7. Revolut ‚Äî Fintech Simplicity with Crypto Integration Revolut merges fintech banking and crypto investing in one mobile app. Users can buy crypto instantly with their Revolut card balance, making it one of the fastest ways to enter the market without traditional exchange accounts. While spreads are slightly higher than specialized exchanges, Revolut‚Äôs ease of use, licensed operations, and instant access make it attractive for smaller purchases. Best for: Everyday users who want quick, app-based crypto purchases. Top Platforms for Buying Crypto via SEPA Platform Regulatory Status Fees / Spread Best For Clapp EU VASP License (CZ) Competitive Regulated all-in-one app Coinbase Licensed in EU / US ~3.99% Beginners Binance Multiple EU registrations 1.8‚Äì2.5% Active traders Bitstamp Licensed (Luxembourg CSSF) Transparent, ~2% Conservative investors Kraken US & EU regulated ~1.5‚Äì2% Professional users OKX Global licenses Low spreads Cost-focused users Revolut Licensed fintech (UK & EU) ~1‚Äì2% Everyday buyers Tips for Safe Crypto Purchases Use trusted, licensed exchanges only. Avoid platforms that don‚Äôt display regulatory information. Check for hidden conversion spreads. A ‚Äú0% fee‚Äù may still include inflated exchange rates. Verify your card provider‚Äôs crypto policy. Some banks block direct crypto transactions. Enable two-factor authentication to secure your account and prevent unauthorized access. Avoid using credit cards for leveraged purchases. Treat crypto buying as investment, not credit spending. Final Thoughts SEPA transfers remain the most efficient and compliant way for Europeans to buy crypto. In 2025, platforms such as Clapp , Kraken, and Bitstamp offer regulated, transparent, and secure access ‚Äî while Binance and Revolut deliver unmatched speed and convenience. For investors who value both compliance and control, SEPA-based buying bridges the gap between traditional banking and digital assets ‚Äî reliably, affordably, and fast. title: How to Transfer BTC to a Bank Account: Best Crypto Off-Ramps 2025
body: For many investors, taking profits in crypto is the most complex step of the journey. Buying Bitcoin is fast and simple ‚Äî but converting BTC into euros or other fiat currencies safely and efficiently can still be confusing. In 2025, however, a growing range of regulated crypto off-ramps now makes this process as simple as any online banking transaction. Below, we explain how BTC-to-bank transfers work, what to check before cashing out, and which platforms offer the smoothest, safest experience for European users. How BTC-to-Fiat Transfers Work A crypto off-ramp is a service that lets you sell Bitcoin (or other cryptocurrencies) for fiat currency ‚Äî euros, dollars, pounds ‚Äî and withdraw directly to your bank account. Here‚Äôs the simplified flow: Sell BTC for fiat (EUR or USD) using an exchange or bridge platform. Verify your identity (KYC) if required by the provider. Link your bank account via SEPA, SWIFT, or card payout. Withdraw funds ‚Äî usually within one business day, or instantly with SEPA Instant. Most modern platforms combine this process into a few clicks. The main differences come down to fees, speed, licensing, and withdrawal options. What to Look For in a Crypto Off-Ramp Before transferring BTC to your bank account, consider these factors: Regulation: Always use licensed exchanges or payment providers. Speed: Look for SEPA Instant or card withdrawal options for faster access. Fees and spreads: Hidden conversion costs can eat into profits. Limits: Verify daily and monthly withdrawal caps. Security: Use platforms that store crypto with institutional-grade custody. Best Crypto Off-Ramps for BTC-to-Bank Transfers in 2025 1. Clapp ‚Äî Regulated, Secure, and Fully Integrated Clapp.finance offers one of the most streamlined BTC-to-fiat experiences in Europe. Operating under a Virtual Asset Service Provider (VASP) license in the Czech Republic, Clapp connects crypto management, fiat conversion, and Fireblocks-secured storage under one roof. Users can sell BTC directly to EUR and withdraw via SEPA or SEPA Instant transfers. Liquidity is sourced from multiple providers to ensure the best real-time rates. Beyond an off-ramp feature, Clapp includes portfolio management tools, rebalancing automation, and customizable portfolios for long-term investors. Best for: Investors seeking a compliant, all-in-one crypto platform with reliable fiat access. 2. Kraken ‚Äî Transparent and Reliable Kraken is one of the most trusted exchanges globally and offers BTC/EUR pairs with deep liquidity. European users can sell Bitcoin and withdraw directly to their bank accounts through SEPA transfers. Withdrawals typically complete within 24 hours, and trading fees remain among the lowest in the market (0.16‚Äì0.26 %). Kraken‚Äôs strong regulatory record and clear fee structure make it a favorite for professional investors and institutions. Best for: Users who prioritize transparency and reliability. 3. Binance ‚Äî Fast Card Withdrawals and SEPA Support Binance provides multiple BTC off-ramp methods: SEPA transfers, instant card withdrawals, and P2P marketplace sales. The exchange‚Äôs ‚ÄúSell-to-Card‚Äù feature allows near-instant euro payouts, making it one of the fastest bridges for BTC-to-cash conversion. While card withdrawals incur a small fee (around 1.8‚Äì2 %), SEPA transfers are cheaper and usually processed the same day. Best for: Active users and traders who value speed and flexibility. 4. Bitstamp ‚Äî Europe‚Äôs Oldest Regulated Exchange Bitstamp, founded in 2011, remains a staple among European crypto investors. It supports direct BTC ‚Üí EUR sales and SEPA withdrawals with transparent pricing ‚Äî a ‚Ç¨3 withdrawal fee and competitive trading rates. The platform‚Äôs focus on compliance and long-term stability appeals to investors who prefer regulation and simplicity over complex features. Best for: Long-term holders seeking a steady, secure off-ramp. 5. Coinbase ‚Äî User-Friendly Fiat Withdrawals Coinbase has built its reputation on simplicity. Users can sell BTC for euros directly in-app and withdraw to linked bank accounts through SEPA transfers or debit cards. Fees are higher (around 1 % plus spread), but the platform‚Äôs reliability, mobile experience, and strong customer support make it a go-to choice for newcomers. Best for: Beginners and everyday users looking for convenience. 6. OKX ‚Äî Competitive Rates and Global Reach OKX supports BTC-to-EUR conversions with low spreads and high liquidity. Its interface caters to both retail and professional traders, and European users can withdraw euros through SEPA and third-party partners. OKX‚Äôs broad network ensures competitive pricing across major crypto pairs, while maintaining solid security and compliance credentials. Best for: Users looking for competitive conversion rates and advanced features. 7. Revolut ‚Äî Instant Banking App Conversion Revolut is not a traditional exchange but offers one of the easiest ways to convert BTC to EUR within a mobile banking app. Users can sell Bitcoin directly, and funds appear instantly in their Revolut account. The convenience comes with slightly higher spreads, but for small or frequent cash-outs, the ease of use outweighs the cost. Best for: Everyday users who want instant access to euros in a familiar fintech interface. Best Crypto Off-Ramps 2025 Platform Withdrawal Type Strength Best For Clapp SEPA / SEPA Instant Licensed, Fireblocks-secured, all-in-one app Retail users & professionals Kraken SEPA Transparent, highly regulated Advanced users Binance SEPA / Card Fastest withdrawals, large liquidity Active traders Bitstamp SEPA Reliable, long-standing EU exchange Conservative investors Coinbase SEPA / Card Simple UX, beginner-friendly Newcomers OKX SEPA / Partners Wide access, low fees Cost-conscious users Revolut Internal account Instant, mobile-first Everyday users Tips for Smooth BTC Bank Withdrawals Check your bank‚Äôs crypto policy: Some banks restrict or delay crypto-related transfers. Use SEPA Instant when possible: It can settle in seconds within the EU. Withdraw moderate amounts first: Test transaction speed and fees. Keep transaction records: For compliance and tax reporting. Enable 2FA and verified accounts: Security first ‚Äî especially for large withdrawals. Final Thoughts Cashing out Bitcoin has never been easier ‚Äî provided you choose the right bridge. In 2025, platforms like Clapp , Kraken, and Bitstamp lead the pack for secure, compliant, and user-friendly BTC-to-bank transfers. Whether you prioritize speed, regulatory assurance, or simplicity, there‚Äôs a trusted option to fit your needs. Just remember: always verify withdrawal fees, limits, and your bank‚Äôs compatibility before selling. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

title: Zcash Price Prediction: Arthur Hayes‚Äô Bold $10K Call
body: BitcoinWorld Zcash Price Prediction: Arthur Hayes‚Äô Bold $10K Call The cryptocurrency world is buzzing with an audacious Zcash price prediction from a prominent figure. Arthur Hayes, the outspoken co-founder of BitMEX, recently ignited significant discussion on X by declaring Zcash (ZEC) an ‚Äúunstoppable train.‚Äù His bold forecast suggests that ZEC could skyrocket to an astonishing $10,000. Arthur Hayes‚Äô Bold Zcash Price Prediction: An Unstoppable Train? Arthur Hayes is known for his sharp market insights and sometimes provocative statements. On X, he emphatically stated that ‚Äúnothing can stop the Zcash (ZEC) train,‚Äù directly implying an inevitable and significant upward movement for the privacy-focused cryptocurrency. This isn‚Äôt his first optimistic take on ZEC; he had previously shared positive sentiments about Zcash‚Äôs potential on October 26. Hayes‚Äôs confidence stems from a deep understanding of market dynamics and the inherent value propositions of various digital assets. When a figure of his caliber makes such a strong Zcash price prediction , it naturally captures the attention of investors and enthusiasts alike. His conviction suggests underlying factors he believes will propel ZEC to new heights. Understanding Zcash (ZEC): Why Privacy Matters To appreciate Hayes‚Äôs perspective, it is important to understand what Zcash is. Zcash (ZEC) is a decentralized cryptocurrency that offers enhanced privacy and selective transparency of transactions. It achieves this through advanced cryptographic techniques, specifically zero-knowledge proofs (zk-SNARKs). Here‚Äôs what makes Zcash stand out: Shielded Transactions: Users can choose to send ZEC with complete privacy, where the sender, receiver, and transaction amount remain confidential. Zero-Knowledge Proofs: This technology allows one party to prove to another that a statement is true, without revealing any information beyond the validity of the statement itself. Transparency Option: Zcash also supports transparent transactions, similar to Bitcoin, offering flexibility for users. In an increasingly digital world, the demand for financial privacy is growing. Zcash aims to meet this demand by providing a robust, secure, and verifiable private digital cash system. This fundamental utility is often cited as a key driver for its long-term value. The Mechanism Behind Hayes‚Äô Zcash Price Prediction What could be fueling Arthur Hayes‚Äôs belief in this remarkable Zcash price prediction ? While he did not elaborate on specific catalysts in his brief post, several factors might contribute to such an optimistic outlook: Increasing Demand for Privacy: As digital surveillance becomes more prevalent, individuals and institutions may increasingly seek out cryptocurrencies that offer true privacy. Zcash is a leader in this niche. Limited Supply and Halving Cycles: Like Bitcoin, Zcash has a capped supply and undergoes halving events, which reduce the rate of new ZEC entering circulation. Scarcity can drive up value over time. Technological Advancements: Continuous development and improvements to Zcash‚Äôs protocol, including scalability and usability enhancements, could attract more users and developers. Broader Market Bull Runs: In a general cryptocurrency bull market, even niche assets like Zcash often see significant gains as capital flows across the ecosystem. Hayes‚Äôs prediction likely considers a confluence of these elements, positioning Zcash as a high-potential asset in the evolving crypto landscape. He understands the power of narrative and technological utility. Challenges and Opportunities for Zcash‚Äôs Future While the prospect of a $10,000 ZEC is exciting, it is important to consider both the opportunities and challenges ahead. Every ambitious Zcash price prediction must navigate real-world hurdles. Opportunities: Mainstream Adoption: As privacy becomes a more accepted and demanded feature in finance, Zcash could see wider adoption. Institutional Interest: If institutions begin to value privacy features, Zcash could attract significant capital. Regulatory Clarity: Clearer regulations could provide a framework for privacy coins to operate, fostering growth. Challenges: Regulatory Scrutiny: Privacy coins often face challenges from regulators concerned about illicit activities. Competition: Other privacy-focused cryptocurrencies and layer-2 solutions are emerging, creating a competitive landscape. Usability: Shielded transactions can sometimes be more complex for average users, impacting adoption rates. The path to $10,000 is not without obstacles, but Zcash‚Äôs dedicated community and ongoing development efforts are geared towards overcoming these challenges. What Does This Zcash Price Prediction Mean for You? Arthur Hayes‚Äôs bold Zcash price prediction serves as a compelling talking point and a reminder of the speculative nature of the crypto market. For individuals considering Zcash or any cryptocurrency, it is crucial to conduct thorough research and understand the associated risks. Here are some actionable insights: Do Your Own Research (DYOR): Do not rely solely on predictions, even from influential figures. Understand Zcash‚Äôs technology, use cases, and market position. Consider Diversification: Avoid putting all your capital into one asset. Diversifying your portfolio can help mitigate risk. Risk Management: Only invest what you can afford to lose. Cryptocurrency markets are highly volatile. Hayes‚Äôs call highlights Zcash‚Äôs potential, but informed decision-making remains paramount for any investor. Arthur Hayes‚Äôs declaration that Zcash is an ‚Äúunstoppable train‚Äù and his $10,000 Zcash price prediction has certainly injected excitement into the crypto community. This bold forecast underscores the unique value proposition of Zcash as a privacy-centric cryptocurrency. While the journey to such a lofty price target will undoubtedly involve challenges, Zcash‚Äôs foundational technology and the growing demand for digital privacy position it as a cryptocurrency with significant long-term potential. As always, market dynamics are complex, and while expert opinions offer valuable perspectives, individual due diligence is key. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: Who is Arthur Hayes and why is his Zcash price prediction significant? A1: Arthur Hayes is the co-founder of BitMEX, a prominent cryptocurrency derivatives exchange. His predictions are significant due to his extensive experience, deep market understanding, and influence within the crypto community. Q2: What makes Zcash (ZEC) different from other cryptocurrencies? A2: Zcash distinguishes itself through its advanced privacy features, primarily shielded transactions powered by zero-knowledge proofs (zk-SNARKs). This allows users to conduct transactions with optional confidentiality regarding sender, receiver, and amount. Q3: Is a $10,000 Zcash price prediction realistic? A3: While highly ambitious, a $10,000 Zcash price prediction reflects a significant belief in ZEC‚Äôs long-term potential, driven by factors like increasing demand for privacy, limited supply, and technological advancements. However, it is a speculative target and depends on numerous market conditions and adoption rates. Q4: What are the main challenges Zcash faces? A4: Zcash faces challenges such as regulatory scrutiny concerning privacy coins, competition from other privacy-focused projects, and the ongoing need to improve user experience for shielded transactions to foster broader adoption. Q5: Should I invest in Zcash based on this prediction? A5: Any investment decision should be based on your own thorough research (DYOR), understanding of the risks involved, and personal financial situation. While expert predictions can be insightful, they are not financial advice. It‚Äôs wise to consider diversification and only invest what you can afford to lose. Did you find Arthur Hayes‚Äôs insights on Zcash compelling? Share this article with your friends and fellow crypto enthusiasts on social media to spark a conversation about the future of privacy coins and this incredible Zcash price prediction ! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Zcash price action. title: 21Shares Seeks SEC Approval for Hyperliquid ETF Amid Rising Altcoin Interest
body: Swiss-based asset manager 21Shares has filed with the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to launch a Hyperliquid (HYPE) exchange-traded fund (ETF) amid growing institutional appetite for altcoin-linked investment products. Key Takeaways: 21Shares seeks SEC approval for a fund tracking the HYPE token, signaling growing institutional demand for altcoin exposure. Asset manager Bitwise recently filed for a similar product. Strong trading volumes in new Solana, Litecoin, and Hedera ETFs show Wall Street‚Äôs appetite for altcoin-linked products. According to the filing submitted Wednesday , the proposed 21Shares Hyperliquid ETF will track the native token of the Hyperliquid perpetual futures protocol and blockchain. The document did not specify a ticker symbol or management fee, though it listed Coinbase Custody and BitGo Trust as custodians. Asset Managers Race to Launch Hyperliquid ETFs as HYPE Token Surges The move comes just weeks after Bitwise filed for a similar Hyperliquid ETF , underscoring intensifying competition among asset managers to capture investor demand for exposure to decentralized trading ecosystems. The HYPE token powers Hyperliquid‚Äôs decentralized exchange, offering users fee discounts and serving as the gas token for its blockchain. Its price has climbed steadily this year, mirroring the protocol‚Äôs rising trading volume and user base. The filing arrives as Wall Street‚Äôs interest in altcoin-based ETFs continues to grow. In recent days, Bitwise‚Äôs Solana Staking ETF (BSOL) has drawn strong market attention , posting $72 million in trading volume on its second day, according to Bloomberg‚Äôs Eric Balchunas, who called the figure ‚Äúa huge number‚Äù and a sign of sustained investor engagement beyond debut hype. $BSOL did more volume on Day Two.. $72m is a huge number. Good sign. pic.twitter.com/KpTbiQxZnv ‚Äî Eric Balchunas (@EricBalchunas) October 29, 2025 BSOL launched Tuesday alongside Canary Capital‚Äôs Litecoin (LTC) and Hedera (HBAR) ETFs . It recorded $55.4 million in first-day trading, making it the largest crypto ETF debut of 2025. Meanwhile, Grayscale joined the fray with the Grayscale Solana Trust ETF (GSOL), which began trading Wednesday with $4 million in volume. While smaller than Bitwise‚Äôs launch, Balchunas said GSOL‚Äôs performance was still ‚Äúhealthy‚Äù and competitive given its timing. The SEC‚Äôs review of 21Shares‚Äô Hyperliquid ETF will determine whether another altcoin-focused product joins the fast-growing roster of US-listed crypto ETFs in 2025. Bitcoin ETFs See $470M Outflows as BTC Slips Below $110K After Fed Rate Cut US-listed spot Bitcoin ETFs recorded $470 million in outflows on Wednesday, marking their worst day of the week as Bitcoin briefly dropped to $108,000 before recovering, according to Farside Investors. Fidelity‚Äôs FBTC led the withdrawals with $164 million, followed by ARK Invest‚Äôs ARKB at $143 million and BlackRock‚Äôs IBIT at $88 million. The setback follows two strong sessions earlier in the week, when the products collectively attracted over $350 million in inflows. Total cumulative net inflows have now fallen to $61 billion, while assets under management have slipped to $149 billion, representing about 6.75% of Bitcoin‚Äôs market capitalization, according to SoSoValue. Bitcoin‚Äôs price action mirrored the ETF outflows, trading between $108,201 and $113,567 over the past 24 hours. The drop came despite the US Federal Reserve‚Äôs 25 basis-point rate cut, though sentiment appeared to improve slightly after a meeting between US President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping eased investor concerns over trade tensions. The post 21Shares Seeks SEC Approval for Hyperliquid ETF Amid Rising Altcoin Interest appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: AUSTRAC Puts CryptoLink on Notice After Finding ‚ÄòWeaknesses‚Äô in AML Framework
body: Australian financial intelligence agency, AUSTRAC, has slapped a AU$56,340 fine (US$37,085) on crypto ATM operator CryptoLink on Thursday. The action comes after the regulator‚Äôs Crypto Taskforce, established last year, found late reporting of large cash transactions and ‚Äúweaknesses‚Äù in CryptoLink‚Äôs AML rules. AUSTRAC has sent an infringement notice to the crypto firm, to make sure ‚Äúuseable intelligence does not slip through the cracks,‚Äù AUSTRAC CEO Brendan Thomas said in an official statement . ‚ÄúThe infringement notice addresses previous non-compliance around reporting and the enforceable undertaking seeks assurance that CryptoLink has improved its risk assessments and strengthened its AML/CTF controls.‚Äù Crypto ATMs Become ‚ÄúHigh Risk Money Laundering Channels‚Äù in Australia: AUSTRAC As reported earlier by Cryptonews , Australia experienced a drastic surge in Bitcoin ATM installations over the past few years. As of August 2024, Australia hosted approximately 1,608 Bitcoin ATMs, which has now risen to 2,000, per CoinTimeATM data. Early this month, AUSTRAC said it uncovered ‚Äúa hidden world of scams and dodgy dealings,‚Äù from several kiosks. ‚ÄúThey pose serious risks for scams and money laundering, with dozens of scam victims identified,‚Äù it said. ‚ÄúScams are one of the biggest drivers of suspicious activity and criminals have been using crypto ATMs to move and cash out stolen funds,‚Äù Thomas noted. CryptoLink to Engage Third-Party Reviewers The financial crime agency has mandated CryptoLink to engage third-party reviewers for validating its entire required transactions to AUSTRAC. Additionally, the reviewers will assess if CryptoLink has implemented effective controls for large cash transactions and its AML and terrorism financing risk assessment. ‚ÄúCryptolink has fully cooperated with AUSTRAC and paid the infringement notice in full,‚Äù the announcement read. AUSTRAC CEO Thomas said that the agency will work with digital currency exchanges ‚Äúto harden the sector against exploitation.‚Äù He added that the regulator will take action if crypto operators fail to take risks seriously. The post AUSTRAC Puts CryptoLink on Notice After Finding ‚ÄòWeaknesses‚Äô in AML Framework appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Tron network activity soars, hinting at a possible TRX price bounce-back
body: The Tron price has faced pressure in recent days, but a surge in network activity suggests a potential turning point for TRX. While the broader crypto markets remain cautious amid Federal Reserve uncertainty, on-chain data shows record-breaking user engagement on the Tron blockchain. This divergence between price and activity could be the early sign of a recovery if macro conditions begin to stabilise. Record network activity fuels optimism Activity on the Tron network has reached unprecedented levels, underscoring its growing importance in the global crypto ecosystem. According to TRONSCAN , Tron recorded 12.6 million daily transactions earlier this week ‚Äî the network‚Äôs highest in nearly two years. TRX daily transactions | Source: TRONSCAN Daily active addresses on Tron jumped 78% to 6.23 million on October 27, the second-highest in its history. The weekly active addresses, on the other hand, have climbed 69% to 11.1 million, marking the largest week-on-week increase among all major blockchains. This growth, largely driven by retail participation, signals a significant rise in real-world usage rather than speculative trading. Blockchain analytics firm Nansen described Tron‚Äôs performance as ‚Äútop-tier activity with zero fanfare,‚Äù highlighting how the network‚Äôs growth has come quietly but steadily. USDT drives retail adoption A key driver behind Tron‚Äôs surge is the widespread use of Tether‚Äôs USDT stablecoin. The network processes between 15 and 20 million USDT transfers weekly, making it one of the most used combinations for dollar-pegged transactions in the world. While Ethereum still hosts slightly more USDT in circulation, Tron‚Äôs share ‚Äî valued at around $78.7 billion ‚Äî demonstrates how crucial the network has become for global stablecoin payments. Tron‚Äôs low fees and rapid transaction times have made it especially popular in emerging markets such as Africa, Asia, and South America. In regions where banking access remains limited, USDT on Tron offers a reliable alternative for remittances, savings, and payments. With the World Bank estimating 1.4 billion adults remain unbanked, Tron‚Äôs ecosystem is increasingly viewed as a bridge toward financial inclusion. Tether recently surpassed 500 million users globally, which CEO Paolo Ardoino called ‚Äúthe biggest financial inclusion achievement in history.‚Äù Much of that adoption has occurred through Tron‚Äôs network, which has become the preferred choice for users seeking affordable and fast access to digital dollars. Macro pressures weigh on Tron price Despite Tron‚Äôs on-chain success, the Tron price has struggled in recent sessions. TRX is down 0.54% to $0.296, slightly underperforming the broader crypto market, which fell more than 2% ahead of the Federal Reserve rate cut . Market-wide caution has kept risk assets on edge, with traders liquidating over $550 million in leveraged positions across the crypto sector. Technical indicators also suggest near-term weakness. TRX recently broke below its 200-day moving average at $0.3030 and now tests key support at $0.292. Source: CoinMarketCap A sustained breakdown below $0.292 could push prices toward $0.27. The relative strength index (RSI) of 33.32 indicates near oversold conditions, while the MACD remains negative, signalling bearish momentum. Still, rising on-chain metrics provide a counterbalance. Historically, spikes in network activity have preceded price rebounds, suggesting that underlying demand for the blockchain‚Äôs services remains strong even during price downturns. The TRX price could rebound if momentum holds The divergence between falling prices and soaring usage suggests the market may be undervaluing Tron‚Äôs real-world traction. If the number of active addresses remains above 5 million in the coming weeks, it could confirm sustained organic demand ‚Äî a foundation for a potential recovery in Tron price. As investors await clarity on US monetary policy, the broader crypto market may remain volatile. However, Tron‚Äôs consistent growth in stablecoin activity and user engagement shows resilience that few other blockchains can match. If macro conditions ease and technical support holds, the stage may be set for TRX to bounce back, powered by genuine utility and expanding adoption. The post Tron network activity soars, hinting at a possible TRX price bounce-back appeared first on Invezz

title: US prosecutors reject crypto policy defense in $25M MEV bot case
body: US prosecutors have opposed attempts to introduce cryptocurrency policy arguments in the criminal trial of two brothers accused of using Ethereum trading maximal extractable volume bots to steal $25 million. According to court documents from the US District Court for the Southern District of New York, federal authorities filed a plea to Judge Jessica Clarke, asking the court to reject a proposed amicus curiae brief filed by a third party seeking to advise the court. US DOJ filing to Judge Clarke. Source: PACER. The prosecution believes the document could improperly sway the jury to rule in favor of the sons of Jaime Peraire, the former head of MIT‚Äôs department of aeronautics and astronautics. The brief was forwarded by cryptocurrency advocacy group Coin Center to query the government‚Äôs ‚Äúhonest validator theory,‚Äù which forms the basis of its fraud argument. Federal prosecutors; Amicus curiae submission is useless Per the US government‚Äôs argument to Judge Jessica Clarke, the proposed amicus submission was ‚Äúinappropriate, unhelpful to the Court, and an invitation for nullification,‚Äù and questions about digital asset policy belong before Congress, not a jury. ‚ÄúA brief directed at policy arguments regarding the role of validators in the industry is not relevant to the governing legal standard,‚Äù prosecutors wrote in their letter to Judge Clarke. The Department of Justice indicted Peraire-Bueno brothers Anton, 24, and James, 28, in May of last year, claiming they exploited a vulnerability in software used by automated trading bots on Ethereum. Prosecutors claim the pair manipulated transaction orders to siphon roughly $25 million in cryptocurrency in 12 seconds, Cryptopolitan reported . Court filings seen by Cryptopolitan read that the brothers‚Äô used MEV, or maximal extractable value, a practice in which blockchain validators or traders reorder transactions within a block to gain an unfair advantage. Defense attorneys have accused the government of introducing a ‚Äústunning new theory of fraud‚Äù which disputes how blockchain users operate, without a clear explanation why. They told the court that under the ‚Äúhonest validator theory,‚Äù any Ethereum participant acting competitively could face federal charges simply for ‚Äúdeviating from the blockchain‚Äôs specifications.‚Äù Lawyers Daniel Nathan Marx and William Fick cited United States v. Finnerty , a 2008 Second Circuit case doubling down on claims of prosecutors ‚Äúoverstepping established precedent.‚Äù The defense also urged Judge Clarke to permit Coin Center‚Äôs participation, saying the organization‚Äôs expertise is relevant to understanding the implications of the government‚Äôs theory. ‚ÄúThe government‚Äôs blind opposition to the submission falls within the Court‚Äôs wide discretion to allow, consider, and give whatever weight it deems appropriate,‚Äù they stated. Coin Center, a Washington-based crypto policy group, has not formally been identified in the court‚Äôs filings, but references in the defense‚Äôs correspondence insinuate it is the organization behind the amicus brief. Marx and Fick insist Coin Center‚Äôs intent is not to influence the jury, as it seeks to clarify how the government‚Äôs new legal theory could change how blockchain activity is interpreted beyond the case. As a basis for their legal argument, the attorneys named other courts, including Judge Failla in the United States v. Storm case, which previously permitted limited amicus participation during jury instruction stages. Ethereum‚Äôs decentralization disputes honest validator theory According to news publication Business Insider , the defense contends that Ethereum‚Äôs decentralized network structure undermines the government‚Äôs fraud claim. According to Marx and Fick, Ether‚Äôs blockchain lacks a central authority and that market participants are guided by economic incentives rather than enforceable promises. If those incentives fail to prevent exploitation, they argue, it is merely a systemic issue rather than criminal conduct. ‚ÄúThe Ethereum network functions through independent actors following incentive structures, not contractual obligations,‚Äù the defense reportedly said. They contend that because no ‚Äúpromise to the victim‚Äù was made, the fraud statute does not apply. The defense counsel filed a letter in early October requesting Judge Clarke to limit testimony from Flashbots researcher Bert Miller to purely technical matters. Flashbots is a developer in the MEV ecosystem that prosecutors plan to use in explaining how the alleged exploit occurred. The Peraire-Bueno brothers‚Äô lawyers are against allowing Miller to interpret or comment on the ‚Äúrules‚Äù governing Ethereum or expectations for ‚Äúhonest validators,‚Äù insisting his testimony is more ‚Äúsubjective‚Äù than policy-driven. title: What‚Äôs Next in the March Towards Mainstream Crypto Adoption?
body: Crypto adoption has soared in recent years, a consequence of maturing technology and a brightening regulatory landscape. From retail traders and institutions to merchants and everyday consumers, the switch from crypto-curious to crypto connoisseur has been hard to ignore. With that said, it‚Äôs important to withdraw from the echo chamber once in a while to assess just how widespread adoption is ‚Äì as well as to ponder the industry‚Äôs key drivers and direction of travel. Just as one gets an inaccurate picture of public sentiment from inhabiting a social media bubble, the same is true of the cryptosphere. So, where are we headed? And how far away is true mainstream adoption? A Feel-Good Factor There‚Äôs no better jumping-off point to consider this topic than the latest Crypto Adoption and Stablecoin Usage Report , which evaluated digital asset adoption throughout the world during the first half of 2025. According to the report, US crypto activity surged by 50% between January and July compared to the same period last year, while adoption has also accelerated in key markets like South Asia and North Africa. Moreover, stablecoins have recorded their highest annual volume, reaching over $4 trillion for the year to date. While the credit cannot be laid at one door, the signing into law of both the GENIUS and Clarity Acts has boosted the confidence of financial institutions and large corporations where blockchain and crypto are concerned. The ripple effect of these laws is being felt far and wide; the fact that we are still in a bull market only amplifies the feel-good factor. Aside from the introduction of a comprehensive US regulatory framework, the maturation of institutional-grade digital asset infrastructure has also convinced many formerly wary entities to dip their toes in the space. This is reflected by the activity of such companies: institutional infrastructure platform Hercle, for example, recently announced $60 million in new capital, while another infrastructure provider, Taurus, expanded into the US for the first time. According to the aforementioned report, while DeFi activity previously represented a large share of the index, more structured service providers and institutional participants (attracted by regulated products like spot BTC/ETH ETFs) have begun to influence transaction patterns. Or to put it another way, we aren‚Äôt in Kansas anymore. What‚Äôs Here and What‚Äôs Coming Most ordinary people don‚Äôt pay much attention to what institutions are doing. But developments on the ground are also catching the eye. Take the recent partnership between Concordium and Bitcoin.com, which enables privacy-preserving age-verified payments for over 60 million wallet holders. Or the fact that stablecoins are increasingly being used by businesses for operational and payroll needs. The cultural impact of Web3 technology is also undeniable. NFL Rivals , an officially licensed mobile sports game that features non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and is powered by a blockchain-based economy, has racked up over 7 million downloads. Some of the world‚Äôs biggest sports teams ‚Äì including Paris Saint-Germain and Barcelona ‚Äì have also launched their own fan tokens , enabling supporters to invest in their success. The logical question to ask, of course, is which drivers will provoke the next major wave of adoption? ‚ÄúThe next phase of meaningful adoption in crypto will not come from new protocols, but from improving how users access the system,‚Äù predicts Lingling Jiang, Partner at market maker DWF Labs . ‚ÄúUnless fiat on- and off-ramps are seamless, compliant, and trusted, participation will remain fragmented. These ramps are not just technical tools ‚Äì they determine how capital enters and exits the ecosystem, and how long it stays. ‚ÄúFor institutional investors, the first questions are often simple: how do I enter, and how do I exit without friction? Everything else depends on solving that access point.‚Äù Where ramps are concerned, the news that Western Union will next year launch its own stablecoin (USDPT) and network is likely to be welcomed by many. Per the announcement, the company is teaming up with wallets and wallet providers to grant customers seamless access to cash on/off-ramps through stablecoins. In a conversation with Bloomberg, CEO Devin McGranahan praised stables for their ability to slash costs and reduce friction in international remittances. Elsewhere, London-based stablecoin clearing startup Uxyk is on a mission to enable anyone, anywhere, to deposit stablecoins into existing bank and fintech accounts. Talk about tearing down the barriers between Web2 and Web3! If the banks are able to accept and redeem stablecoins (and not just those backed by USD), the game will be completely changed. The Next Billion There are already over half a billion crypto users, but ‚Äòonboarding the next billion‚Äô remains the stated goal of many Web3 companies. While none of them are likely to achieve it single-handedly, a collective effort ‚Äì to abstract complexity, inspire trust, tighten security, and boost retention ‚Äì will likely make this objective a reality. Here‚Äôs to the next wave of killer apps, protocols, and platforms. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

title: South Korean Crypto Trading Volume Plummets: An Alarming Paradox Despite New Listings
body: BitcoinWorld South Korean Crypto Trading Volume Plummets: An Alarming Paradox Despite New Listings The cryptocurrency market often presents intriguing paradoxes, and one particularly striking example is currently unfolding in South Korea. Despite an unprecedented surge in new digital asset listings on major exchanges, the overall South Korean crypto trading volume has experienced a dramatic and concerning plummet. This situation leaves many investors and market watchers asking: what‚Äôs truly driving this stark contrast? Why the Surge in New Listings on South Korean Exchanges? This year, South Korea‚Äôs top five cryptocurrency exchanges ‚Äì Upbit, Bithumb, Coinone, Korbit, and Gopax ‚Äì have been exceptionally active in bringing new digital assets to market. In fact, they‚Äôve listed a staggering 378 new coins so far in 2025. To put this into perspective, that figure represents a significant 141.04% increase compared to the 268 listings seen throughout all of last year. This aggressive expansion in available assets suggests a vibrant, growing ecosystem, at least from the supply side. Let‚Äôs break down the listing activity by exchange: Bithumb: Led the pack with an impressive 128 new listings. Coinone: Followed closely with 126 new additions. Upbit: Added 80 new digital assets. Korbit: Contributed 31 new listings. Gopax: Listed 13 new coins. This widespread enthusiasm for listing new projects typically signals an expectation of increased market engagement and liquidity. However, the reality of South Korean crypto trading volume tells a very different story. What‚Äôs Causing the Alarming Drop in South Korean Crypto Trading Volume? While new listings have soared, the actual trading activity on these very same exchanges has taken a severe hit. As of 5:00 a.m. UTC on October 30, the market-wide trading volume stood at just 4.96 trillion won, which is approximately $3.67 billion. This represents a substantial 60.6% decrease from the 12.60 trillion won (around $9.33 billion) recorded earlier in the month, specifically on October 10. Such a sharp decline in such a short period raises critical questions about market sentiment and investor behavior. Several factors could be contributing to this significant drop in South Korean crypto trading volume : Market Downturn: A general bearish trend or lack of clear upward momentum across the broader crypto market often leads to reduced trading activity as investors become more cautious. Regulatory Uncertainty: South Korea has a dynamic regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies. Any perceived tightening or lack of clarity can deter both new and existing participants. Investor Fatigue: The sheer number of new listings might be overwhelming for investors. With so many options, it can be difficult to identify promising projects, leading to indecision or a preference for established assets. Liquidity Spreading Thin: While more listings offer choice, they can also fragment liquidity. Instead of concentrated trading on a few major assets, volume might be spread across many less popular coins, making individual asset trading volumes appear low. Navigating the Paradox: Implications for Investors and Exchanges This curious dichotomy between rising listings and falling South Korean crypto trading volume presents significant challenges. For exchanges, the effort and cost of listing new assets might not be translating into the expected revenue from trading fees. For project developers, getting listed might not guarantee the visibility or liquidity they hoped for, making it harder to build a strong community and user base. Investors, on the other hand, need to exercise heightened diligence. A high number of new listings doesn‚Äôt automatically equate to a healthy, active market. It‚Äôs crucial to look beyond the surface and analyze actual trading liquidity, project fundamentals, and overall market sentiment before making investment decisions. This situation underscores the importance of focusing on quality over quantity in a rapidly evolving digital asset space. The current trend in South Korean crypto trading volume serves as a powerful reminder that market dynamics are complex. While innovation continues with new projects, investor engagement and market confidence are equally vital for sustainable growth. The coming months will be crucial in determining if this trend is a temporary blip or indicative of a deeper shift in the South Korean crypto landscape. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping digital assets price action. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is the main paradox currently observed in the South Korean crypto market? A1: The main paradox is the significant plummet in South Korean crypto trading volume despite a substantial surge in new coin listings on major exchanges. Q2: How much has South Korean crypto trading volume decreased recently? A2: Market-wide trading volume decreased by 60.6%, falling from approximately $9.33 billion on October 10 to $3.67 billion by October 30, 2025. Q3: Which South Korean exchange listed the most new coins in 2025? A3: Bithumb led with 128 new listings, followed by Coinone with 126, Upbit with 80, Korbit with 31, and Gopax with 13. Q4: What are some potential reasons for the drop in trading volume? A4: Possible reasons include a broader market downturn, regulatory uncertainty, investor fatigue from too many new listings, and liquidity being spread thin across numerous new digital assets. Q5: What does this situation mean for crypto investors in South Korea? A5: Investors should exercise greater caution, focusing on the quality and liquidity of assets rather than just the number of available listings. Due diligence on project fundamentals and market sentiment is more critical than ever. Share Your Thoughts! Did you find this analysis of South Korean crypto trading volume insightful? Share this article with your network and join the conversation about the evolving dynamics of the global crypto market. Your insights help us all understand these complex trends better! This post South Korean Crypto Trading Volume Plummets: An Alarming Paradox Despite New Listings first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Ripple (XRP) vs. New DeFi Token: Which Is the Best Crypto to Buy?
body: The crypto market is filled with choices, from established players like Ripple (XRP) to rising projects like Mutuum Finance (MUTM) . As investors look toward 2025, the question is shifting ‚Äî should they hold on to old giants or look for new crypto with higher upside potential? Many analysts believe that while XRP has history and reach, new decentralized finance (DeFi) tokens like MUTM could offer better growth opportunities in the next bull run. Ripple (XRP) The Ripple (XRP) price is estimated to be $2.64. Its trades are healthy ranging between $2.61- $2.69. XRP is also among the largest cryptocurrencies in market capitalization with tens of billions of dollars. Being supported by liquidity and institutional backing, XRP has a strong position in the crypto community. Its explosive growth is however hampered by its maturity. There is strong resistance (technically) of XRP between $2.66 and $2.70. Prices have been turned down a number of times. The price can retrace to the $2.50 levels unless buyers continue to accelerate above these levels. Analysts are convinced that XRP might not see its short-term performance improve unless it breaches $2.90 with volume. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is a non-custodial borrowing and lending protocol, which will streamline and improve crypto lending. It is based on a two way lending model, which enables dynamic borrowing or lending of crypto assets through smart contracts. The vision of the project is the existence of an open and sustainable environment of DeFi, an environment where users can earn passive income or capital without intermediaries. MUTM is in pre-sale Phase 6. Each token is priced at $0.035. The project has already gathered over $18 million, 17,500 holders and sold in excess of 780 million tokens of an original supply of 1.8 billion. The next round will increase the price of the token up to $0.04 and the official launch price will be $0.06. The launch provides a potential 500% token appreciation to the initial purchasers. XRP vs. MUTM The future growth of Ripple is not so bright. Analysts project that XRP would only increase to approximately $3.00-$3.20 in the next market cycle, a 20-25% upgrade on the present markets. This is a small positive aspect in comparison to more affordable DeFi coins. The major issue with XRP is that it has a big market cap and high resistance rates. It requires billions of inflows to propel the price upwards. Regulatory uncertainties and pressure to sell whales also limit momentum. Mutuum Finance is however a far more recent venture. It is estimated that MUTM may have a valuation of between $0.40 and $0.60 by the time it opens, which would be the first 11x to 17x growth on its presale price of $0.035. The team is positive regarding the next rollout of V1 protocol , good tokenomics, and a buy-and-distribute system which will recycle platform fees to repurchase MUTM on the open market and compensate stakers. Investing in each token $500? XRP may become approximately $625 in a year and MUTM may accelerate this investment to between 5000$-8000$ in a year provided it achieves its goals. Such difference justifies the fact that older coins such as XRP are being replaced by newer DeFi projects. Whale Action, Security and Stimulus Mutuum Finance has also unveiled some credibility features, which increase investor confidence. A CertiK security audit of its token smart contract has scored 90/100. This shows that this team values safety. Mutuum Finance has a 24-hour leaderboard, as well, which provides $500 in MUTM tokens to the leaderboard winner each day. This participatory gamification strategy generates more community interest and presale transparency. The second unique feature is that it has an inbuilt card payment option, which means that customers may purchase MUTM tokens without limitations. This removes barriers to entry which tend to delay presales. On-chain data has also shown significant whale purchases: one big holder is said to have purchased MUTM of $100,000 in a single block, an early sign of confidence. The Reason Why Investors Are Trailing MUTM Ripple is not a high-growth opportunity anymore, yet it is a steady project in the field of cross-border remittance. A huge supply and low utility growth, as well as slow innovation cycle, limit its price potential. On the other hand, Mutuum Finance is a developing project that needs less capital, provides novel tokenomics, and has a clear strategy of growth. Analysts think that the presence of a working protocol prior to listing might be a great booster of investor confidence and be bringing in momentum to price once trading begins. Presale Phase 6 is increasingly taking off with the increase in demand. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is one of the most promising crypto assets that can be purchased today, as it is represented by a good starting price of $0.06, long-term security, and high-profile whale support.
